Author: eskrim
Content:
I've always be picky when watching Indonesian horror movie because most Indonesian horror movie are sucks. I've noticed most of their movies are so generic. 
They always use the Java culture, black magic and Muslim as their elements. 

Besides that, I think most director of Indonesian horror movie only depends on the jumpscare, I think most of them don't understand how to make horror movie without depending on jump scare and the same elements (Java culture, muslim, black magic). 

Horror movie shouldn't be dependent only with shock factor, they should be making the audience feel disturbed, uncomfortable, stress etc. That's why most people love horror movie because of that feeling.

Author: felix_white_law_12319
Content: Am I the only one think that Indonesian horrors are actually systematic racism towards the Javanese population?

Author: iaminsideboi
Content: specifically negative to east & central javanese
